rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification made to populate the lang.selected array of structures in the upgradestatus record. This will be displayed by the upgrade to give the user the capability to select which languages are to be upgraded during the upgrade.
To effect this change, the following panels were modified:
. Added code to populate the lang.selecte array of structures in the upgradestatus record from the information in the upginfo array AND other pertinent information in the language file.

descript.descript: Modification made to populate the lang.selected array of structures in the upgradestatus record. This will be displayed by the upgrade to give the user the capability to select which languages are to be upgraded during the upgrade.
To effect this change, the following panels were modified:
